snippet: Endo’s offer of $175 a share in cash and stock, or about $11.2 billion, trumps the $158 a share all-cash deal Valeant reached with Salix last month.
abstract: Endo International offers $175 a share in cash and stock to acquire Salix Pharmaceuticals, which values company at around $11.2 billion, trumping around $10 billion bid made by Valeant Pharmaceuticals; offer complicates what would have been straightforward sale for Salix.
lead_paragraph: Endo’s offer of $175 a share in cash and stock, or about $11.2 billion, trumps the $158 a share all-cash deal Valeant reached with Salix last month.

headline.main: Endo Confirms Bid for Drug Maker Salix, Topping Offer From Valeant
headline.print_headline: Endo Confirms Bid for Drug Maker Salix, Topping Offer From Valeant
